ygData.msgSnippet: He claims that the mana song definately gives him mana with every pulse, as opposed to being a song that last has a duration like most of our other
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>

He claims that the mana song definately gives him mana with every pulse,
as opposed to being a song that last has a duration like most of our
other songs.

At some point I had seen data from a timing test that someone had done
on this subject. I remember it saying that it didn't matter whether the
mana song was sung repeatedly, or weaved with 2 others songs -- the mana
recover was the same.

<snip>

It does regenerate on the pulse it seems. What I tend to do when my party
has a healer type in it is JUST regenerate mana and let him do the healing.
If there is not a healer type in the party. I will do two ticks mana song
and one tick healing song. This generally has the best results.

<snip>
(He even went so far as to group with another bard and insult my singing
skills. Yikes!)
<snip>

As for this little comment...if he doesnt like your singing skills, cut him
off......the mana song is like crack cocaine to mana junkies <grin>

Lago Bardoon, 35th Rank Bard of Bertox
